title: launcher not responding
body: i didnt play league of legends for a while and when i wanted to play i tried to join but the launcher dont even open so i tried to delete the game and install agian but its didnt work so now im should do the first big patch to play so the solution of delete patches and do them again not working i would glad to get help

replies.body: There's a pretty good chance that your OS could be blocking the client from running the way it's supposed to. Typically it happens when you don't have the right [**permissions set up**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), so go through the steps in that guide and you should be able to get back on the Rift.
